item.title: Tufted Titmouse
item.description: From a reference photo by Ioannis Moutsatsos. Original photograph of the Tufted Titmouse by Ioannis Moutsatsos Painted using recently learned techniques after watching a video by Sarah Burns Studio, and also other mixed media technique from a Domestika course by Maru Godas.
